response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to its true value, making it an attractive proposition for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
